page.title: 07Visitors who stayed.
page.content: Rachael Maddox lives in Windy Hill Farm in Sardis. She has two sisters. "My mom and dad are English. I was born in Tamworth, then we moved to Sutton Coldfield near Birmingham. We only had one dog at that time called Max. We came here for a holiday and we had a caravan at Meadow House Caravan Site.We decided to move to a little cottage at Llanteg called Fern Villa. Two years later we moved to our farm. By now we had another three dogs making four altogether. After we had settled down we bought animals like ducks, horses, cows, calves, sheep, cats and chickens. We had an orchard and a massive garden. We ploughed the orchard and planted vegetables. We have been here for about six years."
